new.name: 7-Zip-CVE-2025-0411-POC
new.description: Rust Macros No Recoil Guide 🚀 Boost Aim Like a Pro in C and Python

new.name: CVE-2025-32433-Erlang-OTP-SSH-Unauthenticated-RCE
new.description: PoC showing unauthenticated remote code execution in Erlang/OTP SSH server. By exploiting a flaw in SSH protocol message handling, an attacker can execute arbitrary commands on the target without valid credentials.

new.name: SSH-Strict-Kex-Violations-State-Learning-Artifacts
new.description: Artifacts for the paper "Finding SSH Strict Key Exchange Violations by State Learning", accepted at the ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS) 2025.

update.name: CVE-2025-10046
update.description: exploit SQL injection ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping

update.name: lab-cve-2016-15042
update.description: 🛠️ Validate and demonstrate CVE-2016-15042 with a Dockerized lab for unauthenticated file uploads in WordPress file managers.

update.name: lab-cve-2020-0610
update.description: 🔍 Create a safe lab environment for testing CVE-2020-0610, a critical RCE vulnerability in Windows RD Gateway, with minimal disruption using DTLS techniques.

update.name: lab-cve-2025-3515
update.description: 🛠️ Reproduce and validate CVE-2025-3515 in a Dockerized WordPress lab to test unrestricted file uploads via the Contact Form 7 plugin.

update.name: CVE-2025-54253-Exploit-Demo
update.description: 🐙 CVE-2025-54253 exploit demo for Adobe AEM Forms on JEE: OGNL injection to RCE with PoC, Python 3.10 exploit code, reproducer and mitigation guidance.

update.name: CVE-2025-54424
update.description: CVE-2025-54424: 1Panel TLS client cert bypass enables RCE via forged CN 'panel_client' using a bundled scanning and exploitation tool. Affected: <= v2.0.5. 🔐

update.name: CVE-2025-32463
update.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability CVE-2025-32463 in Sudo allows users to gain root access. Discover details and solutions on GitHub! 🐙✨

update.name: CVE-2025-32463_chwoot
update.description: Demonstrate CVE-2025-32463 with this PoC for sudo's chroot feature. Explore the exploit and its impact on vulnerable sudo versions. 🐱💻🔒
